info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued March 31 at 12:08PM EDT by NWS Pittsburgh
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1245 PM EDT FOR NORTHEASTERN INDIANA...JEFFERSON...EASTERN ARMSTRONG AND EAST CENTRAL CLARION COUNTIES... At 1207 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Brookville to near Punxsutawney to 8 miles north of Indiana, moving northeast at 70 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Trees snapped and uprooted. Power outages can be expected. Locations impacted include... Punxsutawney, Brookville, Reynoldsville, Brockway, Sykesville, Falls Creek, Big Run, Summerville, Rossiter, Marion Center, Corsica, and Creekside. TORNADO...POSSIBLE THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
